channel.title: Kick option! Rep++

item.title: Kick option! Rep++
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

I need a option “Kick” if a mod+ right click someone. i added the Kick option for mod+ it display it.
But how am i going to make it work?

if (playerRights > 0 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("snoepie1012")) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(2); // command slot (does it matter which one?) outStream.writeByteA(0); // 0 or 1; 0 if command should be placed on top in context menu outStream.writeString("Kick"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); }

How i make it kick the player

Thank you.

Youri Dudock

Read full topic
